features: 【10.1 inch IPS HD Display】 This 10.1 inch tablet computer uses a 1280*800 HD IPS display, offers a wider view and much better visual effects for chatting or videos, when you unlock the screen, you can enjoy superior clarity and vibrant colors. Through enhanced eye comfort mode viewing, the backlight can be automatically adjusted and optimized to protect your eyes.

【2 in 1 Tablet with Keyboard】The 2 in 1 tablet computer support tablet mode and computer mode. Equipped with accessories such as a keyboard, foldable case, mouse, stylus, and tempered film, you can convert it into a work computer for work and entertainment anytime, anywhere.

【4GB RAM+64GB ROM+512GB Expansion】 Android 11 Tablet equipped with 4GB RAM (2GB fixed memory, 2GB virtual memory) 64GB ROM capacity and 512GB Micro SD card expansion (Micro SD card not included), large storage meets your daily entertainment and work what you need, for example, store photos, videos, songs, e-books and important files.

【Dual Camera and Dual Speakers】 Android 11 tablet has the front 2.0 MP and rear 8.0 MP cameras, supports Bluetooth and WIFI, built-in GPS, uses dual speakers and allows for higher volume and sound quality. 10 inch tablet equipped with a 6000mAh built-in rechargeable battery, enables about 8 hours mixed use when travelling, reading e-books, listening to music, or watching a movie.

【Best Tablet as Gift】 This lightweight 10" tablet pc has a wide range of applications, superior performance, durable materials, fashionable design, and can meet various usage scenarios, suitable for all types of people, such as students using it for online courses and learning. Merchants use it for work, attending video conferences, and managing documents. This tablet is the best gift choice for parents, children, and friends.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2023 Newest Tablet, 2 in 1 Tablet Computer 10.1 inch Android 11 Tablet with Keyboard 2 In 1 tablet can be used as a laptop, making keyboard connections more convenient, simpler, and faster! comes with a 1200*800 HD IPS display, 4GB RAM, 64GB ROM(expandable up to 512GB), Quad-core processor Android 11.0 version, Dual cameras (8MP rear camera), and dual speakers, WiFi, SIM, 6000mAh battery.

4GB RAM+64GB ROM/Expandable up to 512GB With 64GB onboard storage is enough to meet most of the daily needs, you can store tons of photos, songs, movies, and eBooks, etc. Also, the supports expandable up to 512GB. which brings you immersive gaming experience, power to multitask a variety of apps offers improved performance and processing speeds fast. Tablet Package lncluded: 10.1 inch Tablet*1 Bluetooth Keyboard*1 Wireless Mouse*1 Protective Case*1 Screen Protector*1 Flexible Stylus*1 USB-C Cable*1 5V2A Charger*1

10 inch HD Display Tableta PC This android tablet comes with a 1280 x 800 vibrant HD IPS display, wide viewing angle, high-resolution images, and perfect vision, you can enjoy more realistic and powerful images. Dual Cameras The 2.0MP front camera and 8.0MP rear camera allow you to take high-quality photos and having video chats with your family and friends. Long Lasting Tablet This tablet with a 3.8V 6000mAh battery and a Type-c charging port. Reading ebooks, listening music, taking photos, watching movies, the long-lasting battery life up to 8 hours. you can enjoy your tablet anywhere, anytime.

Google GMS Certification Tablet This 10.1" Tablet GMS has been certified to ensure consistent quality,reliability, and maximize privacy protection for secure browsing and communications. have full access to pre-installed Play Store. Securely download the Apps you love, such as YouTube, Skype, Netflix and more.

2-in-1 Working Tablet with Keyboard Multi Function Tablet Computer The CUPEISI tablet set equipped with a bluetooth keyboard, wireless mouse, and foldable protective cover, the tablet can be flexibly converted into laptop mode, phone mode, and computer mode for different purposes - typing, browsing, gaming, video calling, or watching movies, providing you with unlimited functions and enjoyment. The perfect gift for students, writers, bloggers, or businessmen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: works very nice but wouldn’t buy for gaming. it runs slow for gaming but great for tv and streaming services

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No directions/manually, but have used android before so that's ok. Google ho does not have features/settings like smart phone. Talk back feature hard to turn on/off with or without cover. Àccessibility settings work well. Easy to download & install apps I use. Does not hold charge for long (4 hours maybe) but charges quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars my charger has stopped working
reviews.reviewText: the only thing is my charger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These have been decent tables but I am so over my kids coming and saying internet won’t work. Once it disconnects from the internet it’s a pain getting it back connected and it happens daily sometimes several times a day. Imagine having 4 tablets constantly brought due to WiFi disconnecting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first. We are used to Amazon fire tablets. We know how they work and know the quality of the fire tablets. I was most skeptical because of the low price with so many accessories and the mixed reviews. I wanted to get this for my daughters 8th birthday. I was sure I’d receive it and want to return. But I opened it and immediately was pleased that it came as expected, better even. and was easy to operate. We haven’t had any issues and she loves it ! It does allow for parental control. Perfect for the price and I want to purchase again for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic tablet for what I need. I pretty much just read my Kindle books on it. The case it came with is great. Unfortunately the glass of the screen has dislodged from the back of the tablet on the lower left side. This has created BIG problems with charging since that's where the cord attaches. Now I can't take it out of the house for fear of various elements compromising it through the gap. And to charge the tablet I have to push the screen glass down until the charging port is lined up with the body just to plug it in. Fortunately, the battery lasts a long time and I only have to charge it every other day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This tablet is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I got this tablet for my boyfriend and he loves it! The screen is big enough for his games! The battery life is awesome! It's very light weight!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for, and I expected as much. I could look past the lagging and slow loading, but after a month it completely stopped turning on. Just a waste of money at that point.

I bought 2 of these for my children for Christmas. They love them. The accessories are very light weight and easy to connect. The stylist pen is a nice touch, I just wish there was a place to connect it to the tablet or keyboard so it doesn't get lost. The tablets were easy to set up and I was able to create settings for child use very easily using Google. Very happy with these especially for the price.

I'm actually pretty disappointed with how this tablet runs. It's really slow you cannot watch videos on it as it constantly freezes. I bought it so that by daughter could use certain apps on it for school and it doesn't seem to like them.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great buy for the price and more!
reviews.reviewText: One minor glitch, the on screen key board when activated is not of the English alphabet the letters o and s are strange, and also the first row of keys vvery difficult to select. Longer battery life would be appreciated.

I like the idea of a affordable tablet with the accessories but mine randomly disconnects for wifi. I purchased mostly to stream shows/movies and the only way for me to do that is to download and half the time it won't do that because it won't stay connected to the internet unfortunately. Maybe I got a dud.
Love the table so much and I love how it has a key bored so it make it easier to type things and fill out paper work
